Installation¶

The package can be installed directly from the Python Package Index or GitHub. The version on GitHub might be more recent, as only stable versions are uploaded to the Python Package Index.

PyPI¶

The version from PyPI can directly be installed using pip

.. code-block:: bash

pip install scikit-

GitHub¶

The most recent version from GitHub can be installed like:

.. code-block:: bash

git clone https://github.com/schwemro/de.git
cd de
python setup.py install

Note¶

Depending on you OS, you might run into problems installing all requirements in a clean Python environment. These problems are usually caused by the scipy and numpy package, which might need to be compiled. From our experience, no problems might occur, when an environment manager like anaconda is used. Then, the requirements can be installed like:

.. code-block:: bash

conda install numpy, scipy

de
